Instruction: Preheat the broiler in your oven.
Slice the grapefruits in half and place them cut side up on a baking sheet.
Drizzle honey over each grapefruit half.
Sprinkle ground cinnamon over the top.
Place under the broiler for 3-5 minutes, or until the tops are lightly caramelized.
Remove from the oven and let cool slightly before serving.
Serve warm as a sweet and tangy side dish.
